quotes.quote: There is nothing less amusing than destroying those who have no will to live.

You have already fulfilled my expectations. It appears that you’re still hiding a wealth of potential. I was watching you while your Guardians struggled to overcome their trials, and I could tell from your behavior and actions that you were always putting them first. And that didn’t change when Daemon set his trap. I witnessed your resolve to protect your Family, and I was impressed. Your Guardians also responded similarly. Sawada Tsunayoshi, I deem you worthy as boss of the tenth-generation Vongola Family
Pride is not something you can surrender.
I don't know how to give up!!
*To Lambo*  Smile... I said smile! Smile! Damn you!

I consider everything that happened to be precious moments of my life. The pain. The suffering. The fun… And I am here right now, because everyone was there for me. I couldn't have accomplished anything by standing still, without anybody's help. I treasure every moment I have spent here. Unlucky? I feel pretty lucky. This is my resolve.
You won’t know if you don’t give it a try.
If you can no longer believe in the person you love, then test him until you are satisfied.
It is sky that allows the cloud to move about freely. But someday, I will even bite up the sky itself.
You came into my life as a story, you left as a legend.

When you're really in trouble, of course I'd come and help.
That's what friends are for, right?
I want Dr. Verde's intellect. In all honesty I wish he were just a brain and nothing more.
It's the sky...that allows the clouds to move about freely.
If I were to lose a friend...then I couldn't die in peace!

Keep in mind that there are those who get hurt and those who try to heal the hurt ones. For those guys, it's not funny to have something they value so much be brushed off so lightly. How can a man protect another if he can't even protect himself?
You cannot restrain me with logic.
You won't know if you don't give it a try.
Be more confident despite your weaknesses and failures.

The word "discipline" is something that I would never give up, no matter what. But it's not because it is my pride that I will not give it up. It's because I cannot give it up, that's why it is my pride.
I'm not a genuine idiot like you! I'm an idiot who accepts the fact that he's an idiot!
[about Verde] His head is a bit off and he's a pervert scientist.
Small animals have their own ways of surviving.
It's not an issue of what you should do, it's an issue of what you want to do.
Hidden in truths lie lies, hidden in lies hides the truth.
It's not about what you should do, it's about what you want to do.
If you run now, you will be running for the rest of your life.
Hurting people won't help you regain your pride!
Rely on your Instinct, rather than Logic.
Enjoy your life today. Yesterday is gone, and the tomorrow might never come.
A boss is someone who puts his life on the line for his subordinates.
The real me is super cool!
